channel.title: Need help with RUNBATCH
channel.description:
Hey, well.. This used to happen before too.. I can login and all but when I click inside the client window, after 2-3 clicks It just closes itselfs..
Here's RunBatch
[code]@echo off cd Client Files start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit[/code]
I know i used to replace it with something and it would fix it, but I forgot what so if any1 could clear me on that 1, thanks.

item.title: Need help with RUNBATCH
item.dc:creator: @loud170 loud170
item.description:
@loud170 wrote:

It Does the same thing to me, But i don’t know what to do either. So can anyone help us?

Read full topic
